customCss: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif !important; } .bp-widget-header { font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif !important; background-color: #1E90FF !important; color: #FFFFFF !important; } .bp-widget-container { background-color: #F5F5F5 !important; width: 350px !important; height: 500px !important; border-radius: 12px !important; } .bp-message-bot { background-color: #E0F7FA !important; border-radius: 12px !important; } .bp-message-user { background-color: #DCF8C6 !important; border-radius: 12px !important; } .bp-composer { background-color: #F5F5F5 !important; } .bp-button { background-color: #1E90FF !important; } .bp-button:hover { background-color: #00CED1 !important; }
